author: bridge-bot
content: <EdFelten> An L2 or L3 chain that used a different data availability strategy, such as an external availability service, might want to provide an additional blob type, and corresponding versioned hash type, to match the external service's API. Reserving part of the versioned hash space would allow that to happen without risking collision with versioned hash types adopted later by Ethereum.
